newsArray.title: Williamson back in NZ Test squad for home series against West Indies, pace trio revealed
newsArray.description: Kane Williamson returns to the New Zealand Test squad for the upcoming home series against West Indies. The series begins on December 2. Tom Latham will captain the team. Several pace bowlers are included. Some players are unavailable due to injury and load management. This marks New Zealand's entry into the 2025-2027 World Test Championship cycle.
creator: ANI
